        List<org.gbif.api.model.registry.Organization> organizationsByCountry(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Country country,
                                                                      @Nullable
                                                                      org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page)
        At higher levels this appears on the OrganizationService. Selects all organizations by the country of their address.

      • countOrganizationsEndorsedBy

        long countOrganizationsEndorsedBy(UUID nodeKey)
        Returns:
        The count of all organizations with approved endorsements for the node

      • countPendingEndorsements

        long countPendingEndorsements(@Nullable
                              UUID nodeKey)
        Returns:
        The count of all organizations with a pending endorsement approval, optionally limited by the node if supplied

      • countOrganizationsByCountry

        long countOrganizationsByCountry(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Country country)
        Returns:
        The count of all organizations for the given country

      • countDeleted

        long countDeleted()
        Returns:
        The count of organizations marked as deleted

      • deleted

        List<org.gbif.api.model.registry.Organization> deleted(org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page)
        Returns:
        The organizations marked as deleted

      • countNonPublishing

        long countNonPublishing()
        Returns:
        The count of organizations that publish no datasets

      • nonPublishing

        List<org.gbif.api.model.registry.Organization> nonPublishing(org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable page)
        Returns:
        The organizations that publish no datasets

      • hostingInstallationsOf

        List<org.gbif.api.model.registry.Organization> hostingInstallationsOf(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.InstallationType type,
                                                                      @Nullable
                                                                      Boolean georeferencedOnly)
        Returns:
        The organizations that have an installation of the given type, optionally filtered to be georeferenced only

      • countPublishing

        int countPublishing()
        Returns:
        a count of endorsed, non deleted organizations that publish data.

      • listLegacyOrganizationsBrief

        List<LegacyOrganizationBriefResponse> listLegacyOrganizationsBrief()
        Returns:
        The list of organizations, with only their key and title populated.
